sentences.english: The vacuolar amino acid pool is utilized during initiation of budding .
sentences.chinese: 当出芽开始时，液泡的氨基酸库被利用。

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸钼和钙化合物在润滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脱水和发烧可用口服补液盐和对乙酰氨基酚进行治疗。

sentences.english: In this article the regularity of amino acid replacement among homologues insulins was explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了同源胰岛素间氨基酸取代的规律性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To study the compositions and contents of Amino Acids in the Fruit of Eucalyptus globulus Labill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蓝桉果实中氨基酸的种类并测定其含量。

sentences.english: Together, they read the genetic code and match it up to amino acids (see diagram).
sentences.chinese: 同时，他们读取基因密码子并将其与氨基酸进行匹配。

sentences.english: The result show that all the natural amino-acids will follow the rule of helix theory.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，氨基酸类化合物也遵从螺旋理论的规律。

sentences.english: L-histidine is an alkalescence amino acid with an imidazole group.
sentences.chinese: 组氨酸是含咪唑核的碱性氨基酸。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖对大肠杆菌的抑菌作用与其氨基的质子化有关。

sentences.english: The 'head'amino acids arise to a great extent by a process of transamination.
sentences.chinese: “为首的”氨基酸很大程度上在转氨作用过程中出现。

sentences.english: Thermostability of enzymes can be altered by single amino acid substitution.
sentences.chinese: 单一氨基酸的置换可以改变酶的热稳定性。

sentences.english: Conclusions:Selective iNOS inhibitor-aminoguanidine has protective effect on the transplanted pancreas in rats.
sentences.chinese: 选择性抑制剂氨基胍在大鼠胰腺移植中起到保护作用。

sentences.english: It may be one of the characteristics of metabolism of plasma amino acids in hyperthyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是甲亢患者氨基酸代谢的特征之一。

sentences.english: Human pancreatic ribonuclease has 128 amino acid residues.
sentences.chinese: 人的胰腺核糖核酸酶有128个氨基酸残基。

sentences.english: Bile also neutralizes some of the acids that are found in certain types of food.
sentences.chinese: 胆汁也中和某些氨基酸被发现在某些类型的食物。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the effect of carboxyl-amino-polysaccharide on the gastric ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察羧基化氨基多糖药物抗胃溃疡的作用。

definition: peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)
